trans-unit.source: What Are Cookies
trans-unit.target: Cookies гэж юу вэ

trans-unit.source: As is common practice with almost all professional websites this site uses cookies, which are tiny files that are downloaded to your computer, to improve your experience. This page describes what information they gather, how we use it and why we sometimes need to store these cookies. We will also share how you can prevent these cookies from being stored however this may downgrade or 'break' certain elements of the sites functionality.
trans-unit.target: As is common practice with almost all professional websites this site uses cookies, which are tiny files that are downloaded to your computer, to improve your experience. This page describes what information they gather, how we use it and why we sometimes need to store these cookies. We will also share how you can prevent these cookies from being stored however this may downgrade or 'break' certain elements of the sites functionality.

trans-unit.source: For more general information on cookies see the Wikipedia article on HTTP Cookies.
trans-unit.target: For more general information on cookies see the Wikipedia article on HTTP Cookies.

trans-unit.source: How We Use Cookies
trans-unit.target: Бид хэрхэн Cookies ашигладаг вэ

trans-unit.source: We use cookies for a variety of reasons detailed below. Unfortunately in most cases there are no industry standard options for disabling cookies without completely disabling the functionality and features they add to this site. It is recommended that you leave on all cookies if you are not sure whether you need them or not in case they are used to provide a service that you use.
trans-unit.target: We use cookies for a variety of reasons detailed below. Unfortunately in most cases there are no industry standard options for disabling cookies without completely disabling the functionality and features they add to this site. It is recommended that you leave on all cookies if you are not sure whether you need them or not in case they are used to provide a service that you use.

trans-unit.source: Disabling Cookies
trans-unit.target: Cookies Идэвхгүй болгох

trans-unit.source: You can prevent the setting of cookies by adjusting the settings on your browser (see your browser Help for how to do this). Be aware that disabling cookies will affect the functionality of this and many other websites that you visit. Disabling cookies will usually result in also disabling certain functionality and features of the this site. Therefore it is recommended that you do not disable cookies.
trans-unit.target: You can prevent the setting of cookies by adjusting the settings on your browser (see your browser Help for how to do this). Be aware that disabling cookies will affect the functionality of this and many other websites that you visit. Disabling cookies will usually result in also disabling certain functionality and features of the this site. Therefore it is recommended that you do not disable cookies.

trans-unit.source: The Cookies We Set
trans-unit.target: The Cookies We Set

trans-unit.source: Surveys related cookies
trans-unit.target: Surveys related cookies

trans-unit.source: From time to time we offer user surveys and questionnaires to provide you with interesting insights, helpful tools, or to understand our user base more accurately. These surveys may use cookies to remember who has already taken part in a survey or to provide you with accurate results after you change pages.
trans-unit.target: From time to time we offer user surveys and questionnaires to provide you with interesting insights, helpful tools, or to understand our user base more accurately. These surveys may use cookies to remember who has already taken part in a survey or to provide you with accurate results after you change pages.

trans-unit.source: Forms related cookies
trans-unit.target: Forms related cookies

trans-unit.source: When you submit data to through a form such as those found on contact pages or comment forms cookies may be set to remember your user details for future correspondence.
trans-unit.target: When you submit data to through a form such as those found on contact pages or comment forms cookies may be set to remember your user details for future correspondence.

trans-unit.source: Site preferences cookies
trans-unit.target: Site preferences cookies

trans-unit.source: In order to provide you with a great experience on this site we provide the functionality to set your preferences for how this site runs when you use it. In order to remember your preferences we need to set cookies so that this information can be called whenever you interact with a page is affected by your preferences.
trans-unit.target: In order to provide you with a great experience on this site we provide the functionality to set your preferences for how this site runs when you use it. In order to remember your preferences we need to set cookies so that this information can be called whenever you interact with a page is affected by your preferences.

trans-unit.source: Third Party Cookies
trans-unit.target: Third Party Cookies

trans-unit.source: In some special cases we also use cookies provided by trusted third parties. The following section details which third party cookies you might encounter through this site:
trans-unit.target: In some special cases we also use cookies provided by trusted third parties. The following section details which third party cookies you might encounter through this site:

trans-unit.source: Third party analytics are used to track and measure usage of this site so that we can continue to produce engaging content. These cookies may track things such as how long you spend on the site or pages you visit which helps us to understand how we can improve the site for you.
trans-unit.target: Third party analytics are used to track and measure usage of this site so that we can continue to produce engaging content. These cookies may track things such as how long you spend on the site or pages you visit which helps us to understand how we can improve the site for you.

trans-unit.source: From time to time we test new features and make subtle changes to the way that the site is delivered. When we are still testing new features these cookies may be used to ensure that you receive a consistent experience whilst on the site whilst ensuring we understand which optimisations our users appreciate the most.
trans-unit.target: From time to time we test new features and make subtle changes to the way that the site is delivered. When we are still testing new features these cookies may be used to ensure that you receive a consistent experience whilst on the site whilst ensuring we understand which optimisations our users appreciate the most.

trans-unit.source: The Google AdSense service we use to serve advertising uses a DoubleClick cookie to serve more relevant ads across the web and limit the number of times that a given ad is shown to you.
trans-unit.target: The Google AdSense service we use to serve advertising uses a DoubleClick cookie to serve more relevant ads across the web and limit the number of times that a given ad is shown to you.

trans-unit.source: For more information on Google AdSense see the official Google AdSense privacy FAQ.
trans-unit.target: For more information on Google AdSense see the official Google AdSense privacy FAQ.

trans-unit.source: We use adverts to offset the costs of running this site and provide funding for further development. The behavioural advertising cookies used by this site are designed to ensure that we provide you with the most relevant adverts where possible by anonymously tracking your interests and presenting similar things that may be of interest.
trans-unit.target: We use adverts to offset the costs of running this site and provide funding for further development. The behavioural advertising cookies used by this site are designed to ensure that we provide you with the most relevant adverts where possible by anonymously tracking your interests and presenting similar things that may be of interest.

trans-unit.source: We also use social media buttons and/or plugins on this site that allow you to connect with your social network in various ways. For these to work the following social media sites including Facebook, Twitter, Instagram etc, will set cookies through our site which may be used to enhance your profile on their site or contribute to the data they hold for various purposes outlined in their respective privacy policies.
trans-unit.target: We also use social media buttons and/or plugins on this site that allow you to connect with your social network in various ways. For these to work the following social media sites including Facebook, Twitter, Instagram etc, will set cookies through our site which may be used to enhance your profile on their site or contribute to the data they hold for various purposes outlined in their respective privacy policies.

trans-unit.target: More Information

trans-unit.source: Privacy Policy for Random Password Generator Org
trans-unit.target: Privacy Policy for Random Password Generator Org

trans-unit.source: This privacy policy has been compiled to better serve those who are concerned with how their 'Personally Identifiable Information' (PII) is being used online. PII, as described in US privacy law and information security, is information that can be used on its own or with other information to identify, contact, or locate a single person, or to identify an individual in context. Please read our privacy policy carefully to get a clear understanding of how we collect, use, protect or otherwise handle your Personally Identifiable Information in accordance with our website.
trans-unit.target: This privacy policy has been compiled to better serve those who are concerned with how their 'Personally Identifiable Information' (PII) is being used online. PII, as described in US privacy law and information security, is information that can be used on its own or with other information to identify, contact, or locate a single person, or to identify an individual in context. Please read our privacy policy carefully to get a clear understanding of how we collect, use, protect or otherwise handle your Personally Identifiable Information in accordance with our website.

trans-unit.source: What personal information do we collect from the people that visit our website?
trans-unit.target: What personal information do we collect from the people that visit our website?

trans-unit.source: When ordering or registering on our site, as appropriate, you may be asked to enter your or other details to help you with your experience.
trans-unit.target: When ordering or registering on our site, as appropriate, you may be asked to enter your or other details to help you with your experience.

trans-unit.target: When do we collect information?

trans-unit.target: We may collect information from you when you or enter information on our site.

trans-unit.target: How do we use your information?

trans-unit.target: We may use the information we collect from you when you register, sign up for our newsletter, respond to a survey or marketing communication, surf the website, or use certain other site features in the following ways:

trans-unit.source: To personalize your experience and to allow us to deliver the type of content and product offerings in which you are most interested.
trans-unit.target: To personalize your experience and to allow us to deliver the type of content and product offerings in which you are most interested.

trans-unit.source: To improve our website in order to better serve you.
trans-unit.target: To improve our website in order to better serve you.

trans-unit.source: To allow us to better service you in responding to your customer service requests.
trans-unit.target: To allow us to better service you in responding to your customer service requests.

trans-unit.source: To administer a contest, promotion, survey or other site feature.
trans-unit.target: To administer a contest, promotion, survey or other site feature.

trans-unit.source: To ask for ratings and reviews of services or products.
trans-unit.target: To ask for ratings and reviews of services or products.

trans-unit.source: To follow up with them after correspondence (live chat, email or phone inquiries).
trans-unit.target: To follow up with them after correspondence (live chat, email or phone inquiries).

trans-unit.source: How do we protect your information?
trans-unit.target: How do we protect your information?

trans-unit.source: We do not use vulnerability scanning and/or scanning to PCI standards. We only provide articles and information. We never ask for credit card numbers. We use regular Malware Scanning.
trans-unit.target: We do not use vulnerability scanning and/or scanning to PCI standards. We only provide articles and information. We never ask for credit card numbers. We use regular Malware Scanning.

trans-unit.source: Your personal information is contained behind secured networks and is only accessible by a limited number of persons who have special access rights to such systems, and are required to keep the information confidential. In addition, all sensitive information you supply is encrypted via Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology.
trans-unit.target: Your personal information is contained behind secured networks and is only accessible by a limited number of persons who have special access rights to such systems, and are required to keep the information confidential. In addition, all sensitive information you supply is encrypted via Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology.

trans-unit.source: We implement a variety of security measures when a user enters, submits, or accesses their information to maintain the safety of your personal information.
trans-unit.target: We implement a variety of security measures when a user enters, submits, or accesses their information to maintain the safety of your personal information.

trans-unit.source: Do we use 'cookies'?
trans-unit.target: Do we use 'cookies'?

trans-unit.source: Yes. Cookies are small files that a site or its service provider transfers to your computer's hard drive through your Web browser (if you allow) that enables the site's or service provider's systems to recognize your browser and capture and remember certain information. For instance, we use cookies to help us remember and process the items in your shopping cart. They are also used to help us understand your preferences based on previous or current site activity, which enables us to provide you with improved services. We also use cookies to help us compile aggregate data about site traffic and site interaction so that we can offer better site experiences and tools in the future.
trans-unit.target: Yes. Cookies are small files that a site or its service provider transfers to your computer's hard drive through your Web browser (if you allow) that enables the site's or service provider's systems to recognize your browser and capture and remember certain information. For instance, we use cookies to help us remember and process the items in your shopping cart. They are also used to help us understand your preferences based on previous or current site activity, which enables us to provide you with improved services. We also use cookies to help us compile aggregate data about site traffic and site interaction so that we can offer better site experiences and tools in the future.

trans-unit.source: We use cookies to:
trans-unit.target: We use cookies to:

trans-unit.source: Understand and save user's preferences for future visits.
trans-unit.target: Understand and save user's preferences for future visits.

trans-unit.source: Keep track of advertisements.
trans-unit.target: Keep track of advertisements.

trans-unit.source: Compile aggregate data about site traffic and site interactions in order to offer better site experiences and tools in the future. We may also use trusted third-party services that track this information on our behalf.
trans-unit.target: Compile aggregate data about site traffic and site interactions in order to offer better site experiences and tools in the future. We may also use trusted third-party services that track this information on our behalf.

trans-unit.source: You can choose to have your computer warn you each time a cookie is being sent, or you can choose to turn off all cookies. You do this through your browser settings. Since browser is a little different, look at your browser's Help Menu to learn the correct way to modify your cookies.
trans-unit.target: You can choose to have your computer warn you each time a cookie is being sent, or you can choose to turn off all cookies. You do this through your browser settings. Since browser is a little different, look at your browser's Help Menu to learn the correct way to modify your cookies.

trans-unit.source: If you turn cookies off it will turn off some of the features of the site.
trans-unit.target: If you turn cookies off it will turn off some of the features of the site.

trans-unit.source: Third-party disclosure
trans-unit.target: Third-party disclosure

trans-unit.source: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your Personally Identifiable Information unless we provide users with advance notice. This does not include website hosting partners and other parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or serving our users, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. We may also release information when it's release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect ours or others' rights, property or safety.
trans-unit.target: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your Personally Identifiable Information unless we provide users with advance notice. This does not include website hosting partners and other parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or serving our users, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. We may also release information when it's release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect ours or others' rights, property or safety.

trans-unit.source: However, non-personally identifiable visitor information may be provided to other parties for marketing, advertising, or other uses.
trans-unit.target: However, non-personally identifiable visitor information may be provided to other parties for marketing, advertising, or other uses.

trans-unit.source: Third-party links
trans-unit.target: Third-party links

trans-unit.source: Occasionally, at our discretion, we may include or offer third-party products or services on our website. These third-party sites have separate and independent privacy policies. We therefore have no responsibility or liability for the content and activities of these linked sites. Nonetheless, we seek to protect the integrity of our site and welcome any feedback about these sites.

trans-unit.source: California Online Privacy Protection Act
trans-unit.target: California Online Privacy Protection Act

trans-unit.source: CalOPPA is the first state law in the nation to require commercial websites and online services to post a privacy policy. The law's reach stretches well beyond California to require any person or company in the United States (and conceivably the world) that operates websites collecting Personally Identifiable Information from California consumers to post a conspicuous privacy policy on its website stating exactly the information being collected and those individuals or companies with whom it is being shared. - See more at: http://consumercal.org/california-online-privacy-protection-act-caloppa/#sthash.0FdRbT51.dpuf
trans-unit.target: CalOPPA is the first state law in the nation to require commercial websites and online services to post a privacy policy. The law's reach stretches well beyond California to require any person or company in the United States (and conceivably the world) that operates websites collecting Personally Identifiable Information from California consumers to post a conspicuous privacy policy on its website stating exactly the information being collected and those individuals or companies with whom it is being shared. - See more at: http://consumercal.org/california-online-privacy-protection-act-caloppa/#sthash.0FdRbT51.dpuf

trans-unit.source: According to CalOPPA, we agree to the following:
trans-unit.target: According to CalOPPA, we agree to the following:

trans-unit.source: Users can visit our site anonymously. Once this privacy policy is created, we will add a link to it on our home page or as a minimum, on the first significant page after entering our website. Our Privacy Policy link includes the word 'Privacy' and can easily be found on the page specified above.
trans-unit.target: Users can visit our site anonymously. Once this privacy policy is created, we will add a link to it on our home page or as a minimum, on the first significant page after entering our website. Our Privacy Policy link includes the word 'Privacy' and can easily be found on the page specified above.

trans-unit.source: COPPA (Children Online Privacy Protection Act)
trans-unit.target: COPPA (Children Online Privacy Protection Act)

trans-unit.source: When it comes to the collection of personal information from children under the age of 13 years old, the Children's Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA) puts parents in control. The Federal Trade Commission, United States' consumer protection agency, enforces the COPPA Rule, which spells out what operators of websites and online services must do to protect children's privacy and safety online.
trans-unit.target: When it comes to the collection of personal information from children under the age of 13 years old, the Children's Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA) puts parents in control. The Federal Trade Commission, United States' consumer protection agency, enforces the COPPA Rule, which spells out what operators of websites and online services must do to protect children's privacy and safety online.

trans-unit.source: We do not specifically market to children under the age of 13 years old.
trans-unit.target: We do not specifically market to children under the age of 13 years old.

trans-unit.source: Fair Information Practices
trans-unit.target: Fair Information Practices

trans-unit.source: The Fair Information Practices Principles form the backbone of privacy law in the United States and the concepts they include have played a significant role in the development of data protection laws around the globe. Understanding the Fair Information Practice Principles and how they should be implemented is critical to comply with the various privacy laws that protect personal information.
trans-unit.target: The Fair Information Practices Principles form the backbone of privacy law in the United States and the concepts they include have played a significant role in the development of data protection laws around the globe. Understanding the Fair Information Practice Principles and how they should be implemented is critical to comply with the various privacy laws that protect personal information.

trans-unit.source: In order to be in line with Fair Information Practices we will take the following responsive action, should a data breach occur:
trans-unit.target: In order to be in line with Fair Information Practices we will take the following responsive action, should a data breach occur:

trans-unit.source: We will notify the users via in-site notification within 1 business day
trans-unit.target: We will notify the users via in-site notification within 1 business day

trans-unit.source: We also agree to the Individual Redress Principle which requires that individuals have the right to legally pursue enforceable rights against data collectors and processors who fail to adhere to the law. This principle requires not only that individuals have enforceable rights against data users, but also that individuals have recourse to courts or government agencies to investigate and/or prosecute non-compliance by data processors.
trans-unit.target: We also agree to the Individual Redress Principle which requires that individuals have the right to legally pursue enforceable rights against data collectors and processors who fail to adhere to the law. This principle requires not only that individuals have enforceable rights against data users, but also that individuals have recourse to courts or government agencies to investigate and/or prosecute non-compliance by data processors.

trans-unit.source: CAN SPAM Act
trans-unit.target: CAN SPAM Act

trans-unit.source: The CAN-SPAM Act is a law that sets the rules for commercial email, establishes requirements for commercial messages, gives recipients the right to have emails stopped from being sent to them, and spells out tough penalties for violations.
trans-unit.target: The CAN-SPAM Act is a law that sets the rules for commercial email, establishes requirements for commercial messages, gives recipients the right to have emails stopped from being sent to them, and spells out tough penalties for violations.

trans-unit.source: We may collect your email address in order to:
trans-unit.target: We may collect your email address in order to:

trans-unit.source: To be in accordance with CANSPAM, we agree to the following:
trans-unit.target: To be in accordance with CANSPAM, we agree to the following:

trans-unit.source: Not use false or misleading subjects or email addresses.
trans-unit.target: Not use false or misleading subjects or email addresses.

trans-unit.source: Identify the message as an advertisement in some reasonable way.
trans-unit.target: Identify the message as an advertisement in some reasonable way.

trans-unit.source: Include the physical address of our business or site headquarters.
trans-unit.target: Include the physical address of our business or site headquarters.

trans-unit.source: Monitor third-party email marketing services for compliance, if one is used.
trans-unit.target: Monitor third-party email marketing services for compliance, if one is used.

trans-unit.source: Honor opt-out/unsubscribe requests quickly.
trans-unit.target: Honor opt-out/unsubscribe requests quickly.

trans-unit.source: Allow users to unsubscribe by using the link at the bottom of each email.
trans-unit.target: Allow users to unsubscribe by using the link at the bottom of each email.

trans-unit.source: If at any time you would like to unsubscribe from receiving future emails, you can email us at follow the instructions at the bottom of each email and we will promptly remove you from ALL correspondence.
trans-unit.target: If at any time you would like to unsubscribe from receiving future emails, you can email us at follow the instructions at the bottom of each email and we will promptly remove you from ALL correspondence.

trans-unit.source: How can I ever remember a random password?
trans-unit.target: Би санамсаргүй нууц үгийг хэрхэн санах вэ?

trans-unit.source: Good passwords are long and random. The problem lies in the fact that people do not create long random passwords badly. That is why you need password managers such as:
trans-unit.target: Сайн нууц үгүүд нь урт ба санамсаргүй байдаг. Асуудал нь хүмүүс муухан урт санамсаргүй нууц үг үүсгэдэггүй дээр байгаа. Тийм учраас танд нууц үг удирдагч хэрэгтэй тухайлбал:

trans-unit.source: LastPass remembers all your passwords, so you don't have to.
trans-unit.target: LastPass бүх нууц үгийг санадаг тул та заавал санах шаардлагагүй юм.

trans-unit.source: Save your passwords and log in to sites with a single click.
trans-unit.target: Таны нууц үгүүдыг хадгалах ба нэг даралтаар сайтууд руу нэвтэрнэ.

trans-unit.source: Simple way to store and fill passwords and personal information.
trans-unit.target: Нууц үг бөглөх болон хувийн мэдээлэл хадгалах энгийн аргатай.

trans-unit.source: Creates complex passwords when you need them.
trans-unit.target: Та хэрэгтэй бол ээдрээтэй нууц үг үүсгэнэ.

trans-unit.source: You’ll never need to remember or type your passwords again.
trans-unit.target: Та хэзээ ч санах эсвэл нууц үг дахин бичих шаардлагагүй болно.

trans-unit.source: Autofill forms in a second. Use your passwords wherever you go.
trans-unit.target: Секундын дотор автоматаар бөглөнө. Өөрийн нууц үгийг хаанаас ч ашиглах боломжтой.

trans-unit.source: Frequently asked questions
trans-unit.target: Түгээмэл Асуултууд

trans-unit.source: How do password generators work?
trans-unit.target: Нууц үг үүсгэгч хэрхэн ажилладаг вэ?

trans-unit.source: Are password generators safe?
trans-unit.target: Нууц үг үүсгэгч аюулгүй юу?

trans-unit.source: Absolutely! All passwords created using a password generator are generated locally on your computer. They are not saved and are not transmitted anywhere. No one can see the password you create. Just remember to close this page as soon as you have generated and copied your password so that someone else will not see it.
trans-unit.target: Мэдээжийн хэрэг! Нууц үг үүсгэгч ашиглан үүсгэсэн бүх нууц үгс нь таны компьютер дээр боловсорогдсон байдаг. Тэд хадгалагдахгүй бөгөөд хаашаа ч дамжуулагдчихгүй. Таны үүсгэсэн нууц үгийг хэн ч харж чадахгүй. Өөр хэн нэгэн үүнийг харж чадахгүй байлгахын тулд та энэ нууц үгээ үүсгэснийг хуулж тавьсны дараа үүнийг хаахаа мартуузай.

trans-unit.source: Why should I use a password generator?
trans-unit.target: Би яагаад нууц үг үүсгэгч ашиглах ёстой вэ?

trans-unit.source: Because people are really bad at inventing real random passwords. People often use words or numbers that mean something to them: the name of the pet, the mother’s maiden name, the birthdays of their children, the lyrics, etc. The problem is that you get passwords that are easy to guess.
trans-unit.target: Учир нь хүмүүс бодит санамсаргүй нууц үгийг зохиоход үнэхээр муу байдаг. Хүмүүс үргэлж өөрт нь ямар нэгэн утгатай үг, тоо хэрэглэдэг: гэрийн тэжээвэр амьтны нэр, ээжийн нэр, үр хүүхдийнхээ төрсөн өдөр, дууны үгс гэх мэт. Асуудал нь та өөрөө таахад хялбар нууц үг олж авахад оршино.

trans-unit.source: What is a Random Password Generator?
trans-unit.target: Санамсаргүй Нууц үг Үүсгэгч гэж юу вэ?

trans-unit.source: Random password generator is a online application that automatically creates a random, secure passwords. Reliable generators always make passwords that meet these requirements:
trans-unit.target: Санамсаргүй нууц үг үүсгэгч нь санамсаргүй ба аюулгүй нууц үгийг автоматаар үүсгэдэг онлайн програм юм. Найдвартай үүсгэгч нь эдгээр шаардлагыг хангасан нууц үгийг үргэлж хийдэг:

trans-unit.source: To be long and unique
trans-unit.target: Урт ба өвөрмөц байх

trans-unit.source: The password must contain letters, numbers, and other special symbols. Password must be at least 12 symbols long.
trans-unit.target: Нууц үг нь үсэг, тоо болон бусад тусгай тэмдэгтүүдийг агуулсан байх ёстой. Нууц үг хамгийн багадаа 12 тэмдэгтээс бүрдэх ёстой.

trans-unit.source: Surely to use PRNG
trans-unit.target: PRNG ашиглах нь гарцаагүй

trans-unit.source: PRNG is a pseudo-random number generator, with the help of which a sequence of symbols, numbers and letters is formed.
trans-unit.target: PRNG бол хиймэл санамсаргүй тоон үүсгэгч бөгөөд түүний тусламжтайгаар тэмдэг, тоо, үсэгний дараалал үүсдэг.

trans-unit.source: Generate locally
trans-unit.target: Өөр дээрээ боловсорогдсон

trans-unit.source: The password must be generated locally on the computer / device of the user. Actually, our service works exactly the same way.
trans-unit.target: Нууц үг хэрэглэгчийн компьютер / төхөөрөмжид дээр локал хэлбэрээр үүсгэх ёстой. Ер нь манай үйлчилгээ яг ижилхэн ажилладаг.

trans-unit.source: Useful Internet security tips
trans-unit.target: Интернетийн аюулгүй байдлын талаар хэрэгтэй зөвлөгөө

trans-unit.source: Attach a mobile phone
trans-unit.target: Гар утас хавсаргах

trans-unit.source: Be sure to link your mobile phone to your account, if the service allows. At the moment, this is the most reliable way to recover a password.
trans-unit.target: Хэрэв үйлчилгээ нь зөвшөөрдөг бол гар утсаа бүртгэлдээ холбосон эсэхээ шалгаарай. Одоогийн байдлаар энэ бол нууц үгийг сэргээх хамгийн найдвартай арга юм.

trans-unit.source: Include two-factor authentication
trans-unit.target: Хоёр дахь нэвтрэлтийг багтаадаг

trans-unit.source: In case the service supports this option, connect it to further protect your account.
trans-unit.target: Хэрэв үйлчилгээ нь энэ сонголтыг дэмжиж байвал, дансаа хамгаалахын тулд холбоно уу.

trans-unit.source: Avoid simple passwords
trans-unit.target: Энгийн нууц үгнээс зайлсхийх

trans-unit.source: Avoid short and popular passwords that consist of sequences on the keyboard (qwerty) or easily alternate (1q2w3e)
trans-unit.target: Гар дээрх дараалал (qwerty) эсвэл хялбархан орлуулах (1q2w3e) гэсэн богино, түгээмэл нууц үгнээс зайлсхийх хэрэгтэй.

trans-unit.source: Do not use personal data in the password
trans-unit.target: Нууц үгэндээ хувийн мэдээллийг бүү ашигла

trans-unit.source: Never use the password names of your beloved and acquaintances, phone numbers and addresses, birthdays, licenses numbers, and other personal information.
trans-unit.target: Нууц үгэнд хайртай, танил хүмүүсийн нэр, утасны дугаар, хаяг, төрсөн өдөр, лицензийн дугаар болон бусад хувийн мэдээллийг хэзээ ч бүү ашиглаарай.

trans-unit.source: Use unique passwords
trans-unit.target: Өвөрмөц нууц үг ашиглах

trans-unit.source: Create a unique password for each of your accounts and do not use it when registering with other sites.
trans-unit.target: Таны бүртгэл бүр дээр дахин давташгүй нууц үг зохиож, бусад сайтад бүртгүүлэхдээ үүнийг бүү ашиглаарай.

trans-unit.source: Change the password periodically
trans-unit.target: Нууц үгээ үе үе өөрчлөх

trans-unit.source: Take the habit of changing your password for critically important data at least once every three months.
trans-unit.target: Маш чухал мэдээлэлд зориулж нууц үгээ гурван сард дор хаяж нэг удаа өөрчлөх зуршилтай байхыг зөвлөж байна.

trans-unit.source: Use antivirus software
trans-unit.target: Вирусны эсрэг програм хангамж ашиглах

trans-unit.source: Use the switched on antivirus on your computer and do not prevent it from updating.
trans-unit.target: Компьютер дээрээ ассан антивирусыг ашиглах бөгөөд шинэчлэлээс урьдчилан сэргийлэх хэрэггүй.

trans-unit.source: Do not allow browsers to save passwords
trans-unit.target: Хөтөчүүдэд нууц үг хадгалахыг зөвшөөрөхгүй байх

trans-unit.source: Do not use auto save in browsers, because saved passwords in the browser are easy to identify. In addition, a person who uses your device will also have access to your account.
trans-unit.target: Учир нь хөтөчид хадгалсан нууц үгийг тодорхойлоход хялбар байдаг тул хөтөч дээр автоматаар хадгалах горимыг бүү ашиглаарай. Үүнээс гадна, таны төхөөрөмжийг ашигладаг хүн таны дансанд нэвтрэх эрхтэй болно.

trans-unit.source: Fake pages of popular sites
trans-unit.target: Алдартай сайтуудын хуурамч хуудас

trans-unit.source: Be careful when entering your login and password on the sites, look at the address and make sure that this is the very site. At the beginning of the address you will see a confirmation that you are in a secure connection https: //.
trans-unit.target: Нэвтрэх нэр, нууц үгээ сайтууд дээр оруулахдаа анхааралтай хандаж, хаягийг нь шалгаад энэ сайт мөн эсэхийг шалгаарай. Хаягны эхэнд та аюулгүй холболт байгаа гэдгээ https: // харж баталгаажуулна.

trans-unit.source: Use an SSL connection
trans-unit.target: SSL холболтыг ашиглах

trans-unit.source: Do not pass important information to unprotected HTTP or FTP protocols, because information in these connections can be easily intercepted.
trans-unit.target: Хамгаалагдаагүй HTTP эсвэл FTP протоколуудад чухал мэдээллийг бүү дамжуулж байгаарай, учир нь эдгээр холболтууд дахь мэдээллийг хялбархан тасалдуулж болно.

trans-unit.source: Use the incognito mode in your browser
trans-unit.target: Өөрийн вэб хөтчид нууцлалын горимыг ашиглах

trans-unit.source: When you visit important for you sites, it is advisable to do it in incognito mode, so you can protect yourself from unwanted cookies and tracking.
trans-unit.target: Таны хувьд чухал сайтууд руу зочлох үед үүнийг нууцлалын горимоор хийхийг зөвлөж байна, ингэснээр та хүсээгүй cookie-нүүд, хянахаас өөрийгөө хамгаалах боломжтой.

trans-unit.source: Be more careful with the services of capturing the picture from the screen
trans-unit.target: Дэлгэцээс зургийг авдаг үйлчилгээнээс илүү болгоомжилох хэрэгтэй

trans-unit.source: Very often, all users of the Internet have access to screenshots made through such services.
trans-unit.target: Маш олон удаа интернетийн бүх хэрэглэгчид ийм үйлчилгээгээр дамжуулан дэлгэцийн зураг авах боломжтой байдаг.
